title: Southport 3 bed with wash/dryer in unit, renovated kitchen, quartz...
posting_body: This stunning 3 bed in Southport Lakeview is the prime location.
Situated above the neighborhood's iconic Dairy Queen located right off of Southport Ave.

This home has an "excellent" walk score situated right beside everything you love about this neighborhood from the easy public transit, the incredible nightlife, and the perfect distance to walk to Wrigley Field but be far enough away to not be bothered by its traffic.
Not to mention easy public transit access.
This unit has a recently renovated kitchen with white quartz countertops and Stainless Steel appliances.
Add to that hardwood runs throughout the apartment and there is the convenience of an in-unit washer and dryer.
The back porch faces Southeast getting the best daylight and the most sun with enough room for furniture and a grill.
The unit itself faces all 3 great directions of South, East, and West flooding with sunlight from morning till night.
More apartments for rent & homes for sale: www.chicagodoorstep.com
*Images are intended to represent finishes and may not be of exact unit.
